activities: Maxim Integrated Products processes EU/EEA and Swiss personal data relating to (i) employees and applicants of its subsidiaries for purposes of global human resources management and administration, and (2) whistle-blower hotline, internal investigations and remedial measures in support of global code of conduct and compliance programs.
eucountries: Austria, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and panel, and/or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
